Description: On VA-150 in the County of Chesterfield, in the vicinity of the ramp from Rt. 651, motorists can expect delays due to a vehicle crash. The south right shoulder is closed.
Label: Minor Incident - Traffic - Vehicle Crash

Description: On VA-31 North in the County of Sussex, in the vicinity of Terrapin Rd; Rt. 629E/W (Sussex County), motorists can expect delays due to weather. Lane closures exist.
Label: Weather Incident - Other Weather - Advisory

Description: On I-64 in the City of Hampton, at Hampton Roads Bridge Tunnel East, motorists can expect potential delays due to a bridge/tunnel stoppage. All east lanes are closed.
Label: Major Incident - Traffic - Bridge/Tunnel Stoppage

Description: On Rt. 709 West in the County of Southampton, in the vicinity of Melon Field Rd; Rt. 749N/S (Southampton County), motorists can expect delays due to weather. Lane closures exist.
Label: Weather Incident - Other Weather - Advisory
